snippet.title: In Between Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
In Between is coming to Steam on 21st August 2015. 

In Between is an atmospheric, award-winning platformer where you solve mind-bending puzzles by manipulating your surroundings and gravity itself.​

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/388420/
Web: http://inbetween.gentlymad.org
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gameinbetween
Twitter: http://twitter.com/gentlymadgames
